name: Koopa's Adventure
description:
Koopa must stop Mario from destroying Bowser and his castle,

however, he will go through lots of mischief, and other situations.

Mainly, almost getting killed.

Also, THIS GAME CONTAINS: SWEARING, FLASHING LIGHTS, AND MORE,

IF YOU ARE SENSITIVE TO THESE THINGS, DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME.

Thank you and enjoy!
